location.zh-cn: 莱芜市莱城区文化北路001号
location.en: No. 001, North Wenhua Road, Laicheng District, Laiwu City

description.zh-cn: 原中华人民共和国山东省莱芜市的地方行政机构，行政级别为正地厅级。存在于1992年至2019年，后因莱芜市整体并入济南市而被撤销。
description.en: The former local administrative body of Laiwu City, Shandong Province, People's Republic of China, with a prefectural-level administrative ranking. It existed from 1992 to 2019 and was dissolved after Laiwu City was merged into Jinan City.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任莱芜市人民政府市长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Mayor of the Laiwu Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任莱芜市人民政府副市长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as a Vice Mayor of the Laiwu Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任莱芜市人民政府副市长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as a Vice Mayor of the Laiwu Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任莱芜市人民政府副市长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as a Vice Mayor of the Laiwu Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任莱芜市人民政府副市长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as a Vice Mayor of the Laiwu Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任莱芜市人民政府副市长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as a Vice Mayor of the Laiwu Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任莱芜市人民政府副市长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as a Vice Mayor of the Laiwu Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任莱芜市人民政府秘书长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Secretary-General of the Laiwu Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山东省的省级人民政府，是莱芜市人民政府的业务上级单位。
description.en: The provincial people's government of Shandong Province, People's Republic of China, and the administrative superior of the Laiwu Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 原山东省莱芜市的国家权力机关，对莱芜市人民政府进行监督。
description.en: The former state power organ of Laiwu City, Shandong Province, which supervised the Laiwu Municipal People's Government.

nodes.id: 莱芜市人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 莱芜市人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the Laiwu Municipal People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 原山东省莱芜市人民代表大会的常设机关，对莱芜市人民政府进行监督。
description.en: The former standing body of the Laiwu Municipal People's Congress in Shandong Province, which supervised the Laiwu Municipal People's Government.

nodes.id: 中国共产党莱芜市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党莱芜市委员会
en: Laiwu Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在原山东省莱芜市的地方组织，对莱芜市人民政府实行政治领导。
description.en: The local organization of the Communist Party of China in the former Laiwu City, Shandong Province, which exercised political leadership over the Laiwu Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 指2019年1月中华人民共和国国务院批准，山东省撤销地级莱芜市，将其所辖区域划归济南市管辖的行政区划调整事件。该事件导致莱芜市人民政府被撤销。
description.en: Refers to the administrative division adjustment in January 2019, approved by the State Council of the People's Republic of China, where Shandong Province abolished the prefecture-level Laiwu City and placed its jurisdiction under Jinan City. This event led to the dissolution of the Laiwu Municipal People's Government.

nodes.id: 济南市莱芜区人民政府

zh-cn: 济南市莱芜区人民政府
en: People's Government of Laiwu District, Jinan

description.zh-cn: 2019年莱芜市并入济南市后成立的区级人民政府之一，接替了原莱芜市人民政府的部分职能。
description.en: One of the district-level people's governments established after the merger of Laiwu City into Jinan City in 2019, which took over some functions of the former Laiwu Municipal People's Government.

nodes.id: 济南市钢城区人民政府

zh-cn: 济南市钢城区人民政府
en: People's Government of Gangcheng District, Jinan

description.zh-cn: 2019年莱芜市并入济南市后成立的区级人民政府之一，接替了原莱芜市人民政府的部分职能。
description.en: One of the district-level people's governments established after the merger of Laiwu City into Jinan City in 2019, which took over some functions of the former Laiwu Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期莱芜县的行政管理机关，是莱芜市人民政府的前身机构之一。
description.en: The administrative organ of Laiwu County during the Republic of China period, one of the predecessor institutions of the Laiwu Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 梅建华担任莱芜市人民政府市长。
description.en: Mei Jianhua served as the Mayor of the Laiwu Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 孟令兴担任莱芜市人民政府副市长。
description.en: Meng Lingxing served as a Vice Mayor of the Laiwu Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 张桂爱担任莱芜市人民政府副市长。
description.en: Zhang Guiai served as a Vice Mayor of the Laiwu Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 王茂祯担任莱芜市人民政府副市长。
description.en: Wang Maozhen served as a Vice Mayor of the Laiwu Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 武树华担任莱芜市人民政府副市长。
description.en: Wu Shuhua served as a Vice Mayor of the Laiwu Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 胡文朴担任莱芜市人民政府副市长。
description.en: Hu Wenpu served as a Vice Mayor of the Laiwu Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 郑德庆担任莱芜市人民政府副市长。
description.en: Zheng Deqing served as a Vice Mayor of the Laiwu Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 任旭东担任莱芜市人民政府秘书长。
description.en: Ren Xudong served as the Secretary-General of the Laiwu Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 莱芜市人民政府在业务上隶属于山东省人民政府。
description.en: The Laiwu Municipal People's Government was administratively subordinate to the Shandong Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 莱芜市人民政府由莱芜市人民代表大会产生，并对它负责、受它监督。
description.en: The Laiwu Municipal People's Government was formed by, responsible to, and supervised by the Laiwu Municipal People's Congress.

relationships.target: 莱芜市人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 莱芜市人民政府对莱芜市人民代表大会常务委员会负责并报告工作。
description.en: The Laiwu Municipal People's Government was responsible to and reported its work to the Standing Committee of the Laiwu Municipal People's Congress.

relationships.target: 中国共产党莱芜市委员会

description.zh-cn: 莱芜市人民政府接受中国共产党莱芜市委员会的领导。
description.en: The Laiwu Municipal People's Government was under the leadership of the Laiwu Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 由于莱芜市整体并入济南市，莱芜市人民政府于2019年1月31日停止行使职能并被撤销。
description.en: Due to the merger of Laiwu City into Jinan City, the Laiwu Municipal People's Government ceased to function and was dissolved on January 31, 2019.

relationships.target: 济南市莱芜区人民政府

description.zh-cn: 莱芜市并入济南市的行政区划调整，促成了济南市莱芜区人民政府的设立，以接替原莱芜市人民政府的部分职能。
description.en: The administrative division adjustment of merging Laiwu into Jinan pushed the establishment of the People's Government of Laiwu District, Jinan, to succeed some functions of the former Laiwu Municipal People's Government.

relationships.target: 济南市钢城区人民政府

description.zh-cn: 莱芜市并入济南市的行政区划调整，促成了济南市钢城区人民政府的设立，以接替原莱芜市人民政府的部分职能。
description.en: The administrative division adjustment of merging Laiwu into Jinan pushed the establishment of the People's Government of Gangcheng District, Jinan, to succeed some functions of the former Laiwu Municipal People's Government.
